info.title: Krozu PM
info.description: Krozu PM connector aids the integration of Krozu project management platform. Users will be able to leverage its tree (hierarchy) feature and unique project management solution.

get.description: Returns the current users profile information.
Returns all accessible boards for the current user.
Returns the root boards, or Project Tree root boards owned by the current user.
Returns all boards the current user is assigned to or has Team Member access to.
Returns all groups and their settings applicable to this specified board.
Returns all active notifications for the current user.
Returns the current users tasks.
Returns the current users tasks that are new withing the last 30 days.
Returns the current users overdue tasks.
Returns all lists and their settings applicable to the specified board.
Returns all cards and their settings applicable to the specified board.
Returns all cards and their settings applicable to the specified list.
Returns the specified list settings.
Returns the specified card settings.
Returns all chat messages from the specified board.
Returns all members and their permission levels associated with the specified board.
Returns all records of activity that have happened on the specified board.
Returns all records of activity that have happened on the specified list.
Returns all clients accessible by the current user and specified Project Tree.
Returns the hierarchical structure for the specified board.

post.description: Adds a card to the specified board within the specified list.

listuuid.description: Identifier of the list to put the new card into
listuuid.title: List UUID

post.description: Deletes the specified card/board and its child objects as long as confirmed is 1. Please ensure that that all affected child objects are good to be deleted as well.

confirmed.description: Setting this to 1 will confirm the deletion
confirmed.title: Confirmed

post.description: Adds a message to the specified boards Messaging tray.

message.description: Message to send to Board Messaging
message.title: Message

post.description: Adds an empty checklist to the card specified.

name.description: The name of the new checklist to add to the specified card
name.title: Name

post.description: Adds a list to the board specified with the name specified.

name.description: Add a new list to the board specified
name.title: Name

post.description: Renames the specified list to the name specified.
Renames the board specified to the name specified.
Assign a new or existing user to this Card or Board with a specified Role.

email.description: The email address of the person whom you wish to invite or assign.
email.title: Email

role.description: The role (Chosen from the list of available roles) you wish to assign.
role.title: Role

post.description: Assign a new or existing user to this Board with a specified Role.

email.description: The email address of the person whom you wish to invite or assign.
email.title: Email

role.description: The role (Chosen from the list of available roles) you wish to assign.
role.title: Role

post.description: Unassign existing user from this Card or Board with a specified Role.

email.description: The email address of the person whom you wish to unassign.
email.title: Email

role.description: The role (Chosen from the list of available roles) you wish to unassign.
role.title: Role

post.description: Unassign existing user from this Card with a specified Role.

email.description: The email address of the person whom you wish to unassign.
email.title: Email

role.description: The role (Chosen from the list of available roles) you wish to unassign.
role.title: Role

post.description: Deletes the specified list as long as confirm is 1 and the list is empty.

confirm.description: Setting this to 1 will confirm the deletion
confirm.title: Enter 1 Confirm
